Class Spectator

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Spectator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which saves a snapshot of a Spectator.

      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus()
        Get the status of a Spectator.
        Returns:
        a representation (abbreviated) of this Spectator's state.

      • getAmountOfMoney

        public int getAmountOfMoney()
        Get the current amount of money collected by this Spectator.
        Returns:
        the total amount of money that this Spectator has available to spend.

      • getBetSelection

        public int getBetSelection()
        Get the current bet selection performed by this Spectator on a pair Horse/Jockey which runs at the racing track.
        Returns:
        the identification number of the pair Horse/Jockey running.

      • getBetAmount

        public int getBetAmount()
        Get the current amount of money spent betting on a pair Horse/Jockey.
        Returns:
        the amount of money bet.

      • setAmountOfMoney

        public void setAmountOfMoney(int amountOfMoney)
        Sets a new amount of money of a spectator.
        Parameters:
        amountOfMoney - new amount of money available to bet.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(SpectatorState status)
        Sets the current status of this Spectator.
        Parameters:
        status - the new status (Enumeration of the type SpectatorState of this Spectator.

      • setBetSelection

        public void setBetSelection(int horse)
        Sets the new bet on a pair Horse/Jockey which runs at the racing track.
        Parameters:
        horse - the number identification of the horse to be betting on.

      • setBetAmount

        public void setBetAmount(int amount)
        Sets the new amount of money spent on a new bet.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money spent on a new bet (as an integer).
